name: Valkyria Revolution Soundtrack Selections
summary:
Included with the North American Vanargand Edition of the game, PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions.

Soundtrack selection of 12 tracks.

All Music Composed by:
Yasunori Mitsuda (PROCYON STUDIO)

Arranged & Orchestrated by:
Sachiko Miyano (SHANGRI-LA Inc.)
M05, 06, 09
Mariam Abounnasr (PROCYON STUDIO)
M03, 07, 08, 11, 12
Yasunori Mitsuda (PROCYON STUDIO)
M01, 02, 03, 04, 10
info:
• 艺术家: 光田康典，マリアム・アボンナサー，宮野幸子，早见沙织
  • 作曲: 光田康典
  • 演奏: 東京交響楽団
